title: XLS2csv 20171219.13.33 – Fast, simple conversion of Excel data to CSV
content: XLS2csv a simple and intuitive XLS/XLSX-to-CSV converter for Mac. It handles .xls/.xlsx files from Microsoft Excel, Apple Numbers, Open Offices Excel and converts them to .csv text file format. This Mac XLS2csv converter app can intelligently recognize large XLS/XLSX files as well as a group of XLS/XLSX files and batch convert them to CSV format […]
